thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 26 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Geely's move to buy Daimler stake needs explanation: German minister

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Geely's move to buy Daimler stake needs explanation: German minister
text:
BERLIN (Reuters) - The German government will scrutinize a decision by Chinese automaker Geely [GEELY.UL] to buy a $9 billion stake in Daimler AG ( DAIGn.DE ), Economy Minister Brigitte Zypries was Quote: d as saying on Monday.
“We have to look at it very closely,” Zypries told local newspaper Stuttgarter Zeitung, adding that the decision by the Chinese competitor to buy a 9.7 percent Daimler stake required explanation.
Zypries, a senior member of the center-left Social Democrats (SPD), also said it could be problematic if a representative of a competitor got a seat in Daimler’s supervisory board.
Reporting by Michael Nienaber; Editing by Christoph Steitz
